column4: Hello. I have a problem. My network card says that there is no connection whereas when booting from the live CD it's working. How do I fix it? any clues?
Hello. I have a problem. My network card says that there is no connection whereas when booting from the live CD it's working. How do I fix it? any clues?
sudo apt-get install linux-restricted-modules-$(uname -r)      do that incase its not already installed
I can't do that as my network is not working any other ideas?
